extendedIngredients.name: leeks
extendedIngredients.original: 4 medium leeks, white part only, halved lengthwise, or 4 whole baby leeks
extendedIngredients.originalName: leeks, white part only, halved lengthwise, or 4 whole baby leeks

extendedIngredients.name: salmon

title: Poached Salmon Trout With Poppy Seed Vinaigrette
summary: Poached Salmon Trout With Poppy Seed Vinaigrette is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal main course. One serving contains 298 calories, 24g of protein, and 9g of fat. This recipe serves 4 and costs $4.78 per serving. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up baby leeks, wine, peppercorns, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the lemon wedges you could follow this main course with the Rolled Baklava as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 24 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 72%, this dish is solid. Try Strawberry Poppy Seed Vinaigrette, Peach-Poppy Seed Vinaigrette, and Grapefruit-Poppy Seed Vinaigrette for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Salmon works really well with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. To decide on white or red, you should consider your seasoning and sauces. Chardonnay is a great friend to buttery, creamy dishes, while sauvignon blanc can complement herb or citrus-centric dishes. A light-bodied, low-tannin red such as the pinot noir goes great with broiled or grilled salmon. One wine you could try is Hindsight Wines Chardonnay. It has 4.5 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 26 dollars.

productMatches.title: Hindsight Wines Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Our 2018 Chardonnay is sourced from vineyards in Carneros and Oak Knoll. Fermented in stainless steel, then aged three months on the lees in neutral French oak, the wine shows great acidity, weight and mouth-feel. This 100% Chardonnay shows acidity normally reserved for stainless only wines. This is a beautifully balanced Chardonnay.
